languages.text: {n}Кибелла подбирает когтем каплю яда с иглы и осторожно кладет на язык. Она уважительно хмыкает.{/n} "Крепкий токсин. Таким мажут губы послушникам Кровавой паутины. Мелкие нервы отмирают, чувствительность к боли уходит. Но для мирянина это, конечно, жестокая смерть".

{n}Kibellah picks up a drop of poison from the needle with her claw and carefully puts it on her tongue. She makes an approving sound.{/n} "A strong toxin. We apply something similar to the lips of new initiates of the Bloodspun Web. It kills minor nerves and purges one's sensitivity to pain. For this layman, though, it is a certain and violent death."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла подбирает когтем каплю яда с иглы и осторожно кладет на язык. Она уважительно хмыкает.{/n} "Крепкий токсин. Таким мажут губы послушникам Кровавой паутины. Мелкие нервы отмирают, чувствительность к боли уходит. Но для мирянина это, конечно, жестокая смерть".

We apply something similar to the lips of new initiates of the Bloodspun Web. It kills minor nerves and purges one's sensitivity to pain. For this layman, though, it is a certain and violent death."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah recoge una gota de veneno de la aguja con su garra y se la lleva a la lengua. Emite un ruido de aprobación.{/n} «Es una toxina fuerte. Administramos algo similar a los iniciados de la Red Sanguinolenta. Destruye los nervios menores y elimina la sensibilidad al dolor... pero, para este laico, es una muerte segura y violenta».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up a drop of poison from the needle with her claw and carefully puts it on her tongue. She makes an approving sound.{/n} "A strong toxin. We apply something similar to the lips of new initiates of the Bloodspun Web. It kills minor nerves and purges one's sensitivity to pain. For this layman, though, it is a certain and violent death."

Administramos algo similar a los iniciados de la Red Sanguinolenta. Destruye los nervios menores y elimina la sensibilidad al dolor... pero, para este laico, es una muerte segura y violenta».

languages.text: {n}キベラは針についた毒を爪で一滴つとると、そっと深く舌に乗せた。彼女は満足気な声を出した。{/n}「強い毒です。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの入門者の唇に似たものを塗っています。小さな神経を殺し、痛みに対する感受性を浄化します。素人にとっては、それは確実で暴力的な死でしょうね」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up a drop of poison from the needle with her claw and carefully puts it on her tongue. She makes an approving sound.{/n} "A strong toxin. We apply something similar to the lips of new initiates of the Bloodspun Web. It kills minor nerves and purges one's sensitivity to pain. For this layman, though, it is a certain and violent death."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは針についた毒を爪で一滴つとると、そっと深く舌に乗せた。彼女は満足気な声を出した。{/n}「強い毒です。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの入門者の唇に似たものを塗っています。小さな神経を殺し、痛みに対する感受性を浄化します。素人にとっては、それは確実で暴力的な死でしょうね」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈用利爪沾了一滴针头上的毒液，小心翼翼地滴在舌头上，随后发出了赞许的声音。{/n}“这是一种非常强劲的毒素，我们会对织血罗网的新成员使用类似的东西。它可以杀死局部细小神经，消除对疼痛的敏感性。不过，对这位教外人士而言，这无疑会带来惨烈的死亡。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up a drop of poison from the needle with her claw and carefully puts it on her tongue. She makes an approving sound.{/n} "A strong toxin. We apply something similar to the lips of new initiates of the Bloodspun Web. It kills minor nerves and purges one's sensitivity to pain. For this layman, though, it is a certain and violent death."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈用利爪沾了一滴针头上的毒液，小心翼翼地滴在舌头上，随后发出了赞许的声音。{/n}“这是一种非常强劲的毒素，我们会对织血罗网的新成员使用类似的东西。它可以杀死局部细小神经，消除对疼痛的敏感性。不过，对这位教外人士而言，这无疑会带来惨烈的死亡。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah entnimmt mit ihrer Klaue einen Tropfen Gift von der Nadel und benetzt damit vorsichtig ihre Zunge. Dann macht sie ein wohlwollendes Geräusch.{/n} "Ein starkes Toxin. Wir streichen etwas Ähnliches auf die Lippen der Novizen des Blutgesponnenen Netzes. Es tötet kleinere Nerven und macht unempfindlich gegen Schmerz. Für diesen Laien jedoch bedeutet es einen sicheren und grausamen Tod."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up a drop of poison from the needle with her claw and carefully puts it on her tongue. She makes an approving sound.{/n} "A strong toxin. We apply something similar to the lips of new initiates of the Bloodspun Web. It kills minor nerves and purges one's sensitivity to pain. For this layman, though, it is a certain and violent death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah entnimmt mit ihrer Klaue einen Tropfen Gift von der Nadel und benetzt damit vorsichtig ihre Zunge. Dann macht sie ein wohlwollendes Geräusch.{/n} "Ein starkes Toxin. Für diesen Laien jedoch bedeutet es einen sicheren und grausamen Tod."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah récupère une goutte de poison sur l'aiguille et porte sa griffe à sa bouche pour la déposer délicatement sur le bout de sa langue. Elle pousse un grognement approbateur.{/n} « Une puissante toxine. Nous appliquons une substance similaire sur les lèvres des nouveaux initiés de la Toile de Sang. Elle tue les nerfs secondaires et abolit la sensibilité à la douleur. Cela étant dit, pour ce qui est de ce profane, c'est l'assurance d'une mort violente. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up a drop of poison from the needle with her claw and carefully puts it on her tongue. She makes an approving sound.{/n} "A strong toxin. We apply something similar to the lips of new initiates of the Bloodspun Web. It kills minor nerves and purges one's sensitivity to pain. For this layman, though, it is a certain and violent death."

Elle tue les nerfs secondaires et abolit la sensibilité à la douleur. Cela étant dit, pour ce qui est de ce profane, c'est l'assurance d'une mort violente. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, pençesiyle iğneden aldığı bir damla zehri temkinli bir şekilde diline damlatıyor. Onaylar misali bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kuvvetli bir toksin. Kanipi Ağı'na yeni katılanların dudaklarına benzer bir şey süreriz. Önemsiz sinirleri öldürerek kişinin acıya karşı hassasiyetini ortadan kaldırır. Bu avam adamı içinse mutlak ve şiddetli bir ölüm demektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up a drop of poison from the needle with her claw and carefully puts it on her tongue. She makes an approving sound.{/n} "A strong toxin. We apply something similar to the lips of new initiates of the Bloodspun Web. It kills minor nerves and purges one's sensitivity to pain. For this layman, though, it is a certain and violent death."
